H0.text: What is the square root of 0.25. 0.25

H1.text: What is the square root of 0.25. 0.1

H2.text: What is the square root of 0.25. 1

H3.text: What is the square root of 0.25. 0.5

A4.text: A number raised to the power of one half is equal to its square root.

A5.text: One half is the rational number that lies midway between 0 and 1 on the number line.
